languages.text: The wielder suffers 10% damage dealt to others as direct damage

traits.locale_text: The wielder suffers 10% damage dealt to others as direct damage

languages.text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.
languages.original_text: The wielder suffers 10% damage dealt to others as direct damage

traits.locale_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

languages.text: 使用者がこの武器でダメージを与えると、そのダメージの10%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこの武器でダメージを与えると、そのダメージの10%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Когда персонаж наносит урон этим оружием, он сам получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 10% от нанесенного.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж наносит урон этим оружием, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 10% от нанесенного.
Когда персонаж наносит урон этим оружием, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 10% от нанесенного.
Когда персонаж наносит урон этим оружием, он сам получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 10% от нанесенного.

languages.text: Verursacht der Träger Schaden mit dieser Waffe, erleidet er {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direkten Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 10 % der verursachten Schadens.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht der Träger Schaden mit dieser Waffe, erleidet er {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direkten Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 10 % der verursachten Schadens.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bu silahla hasar verdiğinde verilen hasarın %10'u kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bu silahla hasar verdiğinde verilen hasarın %10'u kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır.

languages.text: Lorsque le porteur inflige des dégâts avec cette arme, il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} équivalents à 10 % des dégâts infligés.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le porteur inflige des dégâts avec cette arme, il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} équivalents à 10 % des dégâts infligés.

languages.text: Cuando el usuario inflige daño con esta arma, sufre tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} como el 10 % del daño infligido.
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el usuario inflige daño con esta arma, sufre tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} como el 10 % del daño infligido.

languages.text: 装备者使用这把武器造成伤害时，同样会承受{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于造成伤害的10%。
languages.original_text: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用这把武器造成伤害时，同样会承受{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于造成伤害的10%。
